name: Eastern_Sun_Resurrected
savepath: New version released: Paladin rework. Visit the changelog here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1c6jxXBuQm_jPK9v9GVN3-rElHx7YO9HZCyGvF6WRABc/edit

A few minor changes for some paladin skills, changelog here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bDyKmG5TCHP5IUmirOsNfHHw2w4OtgS-PwNVwaLKgmk/edit . Fixed a few broken links in the documentation. An IAS calculator tailored for ESR can now be found on discord in the #tools-and-documentation channel.
